title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Meeting of stockholders; clearance of name
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.2 - Meeting of stockholders; clearance of name

State Regulations

Before an application for conversion is submitted: (a) the plan of conversion should be approved
by the vote, in person or by proxy, of the holders of at least 662/3 percent of
each class of capital stock of the national banking association at a meeting
held in accordance with the requirements of Federal law,[FN*] and (b) the name
proposed for the State bank should be submitted to the superintendent for his
prior approval. [FN*]
12
U.S.C. ยง
214(a). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
101.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
